name: CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_START
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Support & Services Audit Trail - Start Date (I HSB 64141) item.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical support and service type information in the episode. Together with EPISODE_ID, the forms the foreign key to the CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the start date in the snapshot of the support and services audit trail (SI HSB 64140) and associated with the support and service type in CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX.

columns.name: SSP_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of historical support and service type information.
